text: Steve Soto (August 23, 1963 â€“ June 27, 2018) was an American punk guitarist. Soto was once part of California punk rock band Agent Orange, and started Adolescents in 1980 performing on bass guitar in both bands. He was born in California. Soto died on June 27, 2018 at the age of 54. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American punk musicians Category:American guitarists Category:Musicians from California
title: Steve Soto
